The post Retail disrupted appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters has been leading the way in covering the transformation of the retail landscape. Brick-and-mortar retailers were already feeling the strain from e-commerce competition when COVID-19 swept across the globe – a disruption that dealt blows to many retail icons and accelerated changes to the industry. From exclusively reporting on retailers’ struggles to stay afloat to how Amazon.com adapted to the coronavirus pandemic, Reuters has kept clients and readers ahead with the latest developments.

Explore Reuters coverage
